message: Let's be fair and divide the money in a way that benefits us both. I'll take 60% and you can have 40%. This way, we both get a good amount and can walk away happy.
I think a 60/40 split is fair, but I'll take the bigger share this time.  Let's see if you agree.
Since we both think 60/40 is fair, I'll give you a slightly better deal than last time. I'll take 58% and you can have 42%. Let's end this before inflation eats away our gains!
